attributes.action: re-look at the Schools National Curriculum to include the study of Pre-Christian Religions and Beliefs in Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these days of social acceptancy in all aspects of life, we feel that the National Curriculum is outdated and prejudiced with regard to Religious Studies in Great Britain's Schools. Paganism pre-dates Christianity but our School Children are led to believe otherwise. We urge you to bring the National Curriculum up to date, and encourage the study of the Ancient Religions and Belief Systems of England.
